information.name: alarms
information.descriptionLong: REST endpoint to interact with Cumulocity alarms

endpoints.name: getAlarmCollection
endpoints.descriptionLong: Get a collection of alarms based on filter parameters

powershell.description: Get alarms with the severity set to MAJOR
Get active alarms which occurred in the last 10 minutes
Get active alarms from a device (using pipeline)

go.description: Get alarms with the severity set to MAJOR
Get collection of active alarms which occurred in the last 10 minutes

queryParameters.name: device
queryParameters.description: Source device id.

queryParameters.name: dateFrom
queryParameters.description: Start date or date and time of alarm occurrence.

queryParameters.name: dateTo
queryParameters.description: End date or date and time of alarm occurrence.

queryParameters.name: type
queryParameters.description: Alarm type.

queryParameters.name: fragmentType
queryParameters.description: Alarm fragment type.

queryParameters.name: status
queryParameters.description: Comma separated alarm statuses, for example ACTIVE,CLEARED.

queryParameters.name: severity
queryParameters.description: Alarm severity, for example CRITICAL, MAJOR, MINOR or WARNING.

queryParameters.name: resolved
queryParameters.description: When set to true only resolved alarms will be removed (the one with status CLEARED), false means alarms with status ACTIVE or ACKNOWLEDGED.

queryParameters.name: withAssets
queryParameters.description: Include assets

queryParameters.name: withDevices
queryParameters.description: Include devices

endpoints.name: newAlarm
endpoints.descriptionLong: Create an alarm on a device or agent.

powershell.description: Create a new alarm for device
Create a new alarm for device (using pipeline)

go.description: Create a new alarm for device
go.command: c8y alarms create --device mydevice --type c8y_TestAlarm --time "-0s" --text "Test alarm" --severity MAJOR

body.name: device
body.description: The ManagedObject that the alarm originated from

body.name: type
body.description: Identifies the type of this alarm, e.g. 'com_cumulocity_events_TamperEvent'.

body.name: time
body.description: Time of the alarm. Defaults to current timestamp.

body.name: severity
body.description: The severity of the alarm: CRITICAL, MAJOR, MINOR or WARNING. Must be upper-case.

body.name: status
body.description: The status of the alarm: ACTIVE, ACKNOWLEDGED or CLEARED. If status was not appeared, new alarm will have status ACTIVE. Must be upper-case.

endpoints.name: updateAlarmCollection
endpoints.descriptionLong: Update the status of a collection of alarms by using a filter. Currently only the status of alarms can be changed

powershell.description: Update the status of all active alarms on a device to ACKNOWLEDGED
Update the status of all active alarms on a device to ACKNOWLEDGED (using pipeline)

go.description: Update the status of all active alarms on a device to ACKNOWLEDGED
go.command: c8y alarms updateCollection --device mydevice --status ACTIVE --newStatus ACKNOWLEDGED

statusCodes.200: if the process has completed, all alarms have been updated

body.name: newStatus
body.description: New status to be applied to all of the matching alarms
